original_title: No Minorities: The Ballad of the Macedonian Diaspora
overview: No Minorities is a story about a small, yet passionate and historically significant group of people that MUST be told. The Ballad of the Macedonian Diaspora is a compilation of real word-of-mouth stories of the trials and tribulations told by grandparents, parents, uncles, and aunts weaved into the fictional journey of our principal and secondary protagonists.
title: No Minorities: The Ballad of the Macedonian Diaspora
